pages.text: You can find some gei’s fun blog here!yypE’s Playground

pages.title: about
pages.text: A random fucker. Oh, there you are. This is a static blog by a random fucker from UESTC, who loves play with computer-related gadgets. but lazy to work. He join a mysterious club with an abbr. of CNSS, where many gay who loves cyber security gather together, so he may share some post about it. That’s for now! Bye-ya!

posts.title: gdb-peda & pwndbg commonly used commands
posts.text: Breakpointsb / break *addr or b func bp at addr or bp at func tb one-time-only breakpoint info b view all breakpoints watch *addr stop when mem at addr changed. Control & debuggingc continue r run ni step over si step in fini run till func ret return expr assign return value of expr s / stack show stack and registers and disasm bt current stack frame ​ Example 1234#0 0xf7e250d0 in gets () from /usr/lib32/libc.so.6#1 0x080486b3 in main () at ret2text.c:24#2 0xf7dd6b41 in __libc_start_main () from /usr/lib32/libc.so.6#3 0x08048521 in _start () Memorybins show bins vmmap show virtual memory map shellcode generate shellcode context show context contents
